room_title: Escape room "Haunted B&B" by Rochester Escape Rooms in Rochester (NY)
review: Our group of 6 loved Haunted B&B! The room was decorated very well, and there was a good variety of puzzles to solve. The staff was helpful, but they keep their distance so that you don't get distracted from the theme. Really well done!

room_title: Escape room "Haunted B&B" by Rochester Escape Rooms in Rochester (NY)
review: I greatly enjoyed the Haunted B&B and am so excited for the other rooms! This place is great and the people are awesome! I love it!

room_title: Escape room "Haunted B&B" by Rochester Escape Rooms in Rochester (NY)
review: Four of us went and played the Haunted Bed and Breakfast tonight and had a blast! This was my 20th room (yes, I'm addicted) and we came with one absolutely new player as well as family members who have done over a dozen rooms. Everyone had a great time! All of the puzzles made sense, were challenging and fair, and had a spark of creativity we don't always see. The owners were wonderful hosts and obviously put a lot of time and effort into their games. Will definitely be back to play their other room.
